News Informer:
Due to changes that were made in this update, there are some quests that |can no longer be completed by normal means. That's what I'm here for! If you have Power of Darkness, Whisper of Dreams - Pt 1 or Whisper of Dreams - Pt 2, then I can help you finish them. But remember, I can only help with quests that were acquired prior to this update.
I'm ready when you are! Just say the word!
